alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Monroe County through 530 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holly Grove, or 9 miles southeast of Clarendon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Grove... Palmer... Blackton... Pine City... Monroe... Ragtown... Louisiana Purchase State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas.
